name: RogueFight
description:
ROGUEFIGHT is a Roguelike arena game where you and a friend battle for glory in a 1v1.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Made by Alberto "_beta" Mellado.

-----------------------

Written in Js.

Credits:

Superpowers -> Flowers, Trees , Particles & Song

Warren Clark -> Character

Hyohnoo ->Keys

-----------------------

Controls:

Player1:

Movement -> WASD

Attack -> E

Dagger ->Q

Player 2:

Movement -> Keyboard Arrows

Attack -> Sift

Dagger ->Enter

------------------------

Contact:

albertomelladoc@gmail.com

-----------------------

I think this is a neat prototype that could be later developed.

-----------------------
